thread.section_title: Planet of the Vapes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Planet of the Vapes | planetofthevapes.com
thread.title: Rob
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Rob

author: Rob
title: Rob
text: Had a problem with a unit I had purchased through them and they went above and beyond to ensure I was satisfied. They responded promptly to my emails, presented me with options to address my problem and always over delivered on what was promised. These guys truly understand customer service. Haven't stopped talking about them since.
